name: Archivist of Oghma
oracle_text:
Flash
Whenever an opponent searches their library, you gain 1 life and draw a card.

name: Baldur's Gate
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of other Gates you control.

name: Bag of Holding
oracle_text:
Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Bag of Holding: Return all cards exiled with Bag of Holding to their owner's hand.

name: Baba Lysaga, Night Witch
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice up to three permanents: If there were three or more card types among the sacrificed permanents, each opponent loses 3 life, you gain 3 life, and you draw three cards.

name: Astarion, the Decadent
oracle_text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, choose one —
• Feed — Target opponent loses life equal to the amount of life they lost this turn.
• Friends — You gain life equal to the amount of life you gained this turn.

name: Belt of Giant Strength
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has base power and toughness 10/10.
Equip {10}. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is the power of the creature it targets.

name: Battle Cry Goblin
oracle_text:
{1}{R}: Goblins you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.
Pack tactics — Whenever Battle Cry Goblin attacks, if you attacked with creatures with total power 6 or greater this combat, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token that's tapped and attacking.

name: Basilisk Collar
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink.
Equip {2}

name: Band Together
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.

name: Baleful Beholder
oracle_text:
When Baleful Beholder enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Antimagic Cone — Each opponent sacrifices an enchantment.
• Fear Ray — Creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Blood Money
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. For each nontoken creature destroyed this way, you create a tapped Treasure token.

card_faces.name: Blessed Hippogriff
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Blessed Hippogriff attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

card_faces.name: Tyr's Blessing
card_faces.oracle_text: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

name: Black Market Connections
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, choose one or more —
• Sell Contraband — Create a Treasure token. You lose 1 life.
• Buy Information — Draw a card. You lose 2 life.
• Hire a Mercenary — Create a 3/2 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling. You lose 3 life. (It has every creature type.)

name: Black Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
Acid Breath — When Black Dragon enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

name: Boareskyr Tollkeeper
oracle_text: When Boareskyr Tollkeeper enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals all creature and land cards in their hand. Choose one of them. That card perpetually gains "This permanent enters the battlefield tapped."

name: Blur
oracle_text:
Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Draw a card.

name: Bronze Walrus
oracle_text:
When Bronze Walrus enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Breath Weapon
oracle_text: Breath Weapon deals 2 damage to each non-Dragon creature.

name: Bonecaller Cleric
oracle_text: {3}{B}, Sacrifice Bonecaller Cleric: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Celestial Unicorn
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Celestial Unicorn.

name: Catti-brie of Mithral Hall
oracle_text:
First strike, reach
Whenever Catti-brie of Mithral Hall attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Equipment attached to it.
{1}, Remove all +1/+1 counters from Catti-brie: It deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of counters removed this way.

name: Cast Down
oracle_text: Destroy target nonlegendary creature.

name: Carnelian Orb of Dragonkind
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R}. If that mana is spent on a Dragon creature spell, it gains haste until end of turn.

name: Choose Your Weapon
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Two-Weapon Fighting — Double target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
• Archery — This spell deals 5 damage to target creature with flying.

name: Charmed Sleep
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Charmed Sleep enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Chardalyn Dragon
oracle_text: Flying

name: Chain Devil
oracle_text: Animate Chains — When Chain Devil enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a nontoken creature.

name: Cloak of the Bat
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has flying and haste.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Clever Conjurer
oracle_text: Mage Hand — {T}: Untap target permanent not named Clever Conjurer. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Circle of the Moon Druid
oracle_text: Bear Form — As long as it's your turn, Circle of the Moon Druid is a Bear with base power and toughness 4/2. (It loses all other creature types.)

name: Circle of the Land Druid
oracle_text:
When Circle of the Land Druid enters the battlefield, you may mill four cards. (You may put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)
Natural Recovery — When Circle of the Land Druid dies, return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Devoted Paladin
oracle_text: Beacon of Hope — When Devoted Paladin enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

name: Demogorgon's Clutches
oracle_text: Target opponent discards two cards, mills two cards, and loses 2 life. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

name: Deadly Dispute
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Dawnbringer Cleric
oracle_text:
When Dawnbringer Cleric enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Cure Wounds — You gain 2 life.
• Dispel Magic — Destroy target enchantment.
• Gentle Repose — Exile target card from a graveyard.

name: Contact Other Plane
oracle_text:
Roll a d20.
1—9 | Draw two cards.
10—19 | Scry 2, then draw two cards.
20 | Scry 3, then draw three cards.

name: Dragon's Fire
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand or choose a Dragon you control.
Dragon's Fire deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If you revealed a Dragon card or chose a Dragon as you cast this spell, Dragon's Fire deals damage equal to the power of that card or creature instead.

name: Draconic Muralists
oracle_text: When Draconic Muralists dies, you may search your library for a Dragon card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Draconic Lore
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Dragon.
Draw three cards.

name: Displacer Kitten
oracle_text: Avoidance — Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, exile up to one target nonland permanent you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Drider
oracle_text:
Reach
Whenever Drider deals combat damage to a player, create a 2/1 black Spider creature token with menace and reach.

name: Dream Fracture
oracle_text:
Counter target spell. Its controller draws a card.
Draw a card.

name: Dragonborn Looter
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Eldritch Pact
oracle_text: Target player draws X cards and loses X life, where X is the number of cards in their graveyard.

name: Earth-Cult Elemental
oracle_text:
Siege Monster — When Earth-Cult Elemental enters the battlefield, roll a d20.
1—9 | Each player sacrifices a permanent.
10—19 | Each opponent sacrifices a permanent.
20 | Each opponent sacrifices two permanents.

name: Dueling Rapier
oracle_text:
Flash
When Dueling Rapier enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Druid of the Emerald Grove
oracle_text:
When Druid of the Emerald Grove enters the battlefield, search your library for up to two basic land cards and reveal them, then roll a d20.
1—9 | Put those cards into your hand, then shuffle.
10—19 | Put one of those cards onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
20 | Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Druidic Ritual
oracle_text: You may mill three cards. Then return up to one creature card and up to one land card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Fraying Line
oracle_text:
When Fraying Line enters the battlefield, put a rope counter on target creature you control.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may pay {2}. If they do, they put a rope counter on a creature they control. Otherwise, exile Fraying Line and each creature without a rope counter on it, then remove all rope counters from all creatures.

name: Flaming Fist Officer
oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Flaming Fist Officer.
